    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Padajoča kocka</string>
            <string language="en">Falling cube</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fallender Würfel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cube en chute</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cubo de queda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cubo cadente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μειωμένος κύβος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cubo que cae</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Kocko sestavljeno iz delcev povezanih z vzmetmi prosto spustimo iz določene višine tla in opazujemo stike in odboje od tal.</string>
            <string language="en">Cube (particles interconnected with springs) is dropped on the floor. Observe the fall and following bounces and rotations.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">prosti pad</string>
            <string language="en">free-fall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">odboj</string>
            <string language="en">bounce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">rotacija</string>
            <string language="en">rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">templates</string>
            <string language="en">templates</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Würfel (Partikel zusammengeschaltet mit 
Frühlingen) wird auf den Fußboden fallengelassen. Beobachten 
Sie die Fall- und Folgenschläge und Umdrehungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le cube (particules interconnectées avec des 
ressorts) est lâché sur le plancher. Observez les rotations de
chute et de suivre des rebonds et.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O cubo (partículas interconectadas com molas) é
deixado cair no assoalho. Observe as rotações da queda e 
seguir saltos e.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il cubo (particelle collegate con le molle) è 
caduto sul pavimento. Osservi le rotazioni seguire e di caduta 
rimbalzi e.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τον κύβο (μόρια που διασυνδέονται με τα ελατήρια) 
πέφτουν στο πάτωμα. Παρατηρήστε την πτώση και μετά από τις
αναπηδήσεις και τις περιστροφές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El cubo (partículas interconectadas con los 
resortes) se cae en el suelo. Observe las rotaciones de la 
caída y del siguiente las despedidas y.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">freier Fall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schlag</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umdrehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
